sportsequipmentproject

Class SportsEquipmentSupplier

  • java.lang.Object
    • sportsequipmentproject.SportsEquipmentSupplier

  • public class SportsEquipmentSupplier
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to model the management of customer records and purchase orders for a sports equipment company. The company distinguishes two categories of customer: sports clubs and private individuals. At any time, purchase records for only 12 months, including the current month, are active.

      • addNewPurchaseOrder

        public void addNewPurchaseOrder(java.lang.String dateStr,
                                java.lang.String customerID,
                                java.lang.String productCode,
                                int qty)
                         throws IncorrectPurchaseOrderException
        Generates a new purchase order record for the current month and updates record of purchasing customer
        Parameters:
        dateStr - a String with format "dd/mm/yy"
        customerID - must be the ID of a customer in the the company's customer records
        productCode - must be in the company's current product range
        qty - the number of items required of the product
        Throws:
        IncorrectPurchaseOrderException

      • updateMonth

        public void updateMonth()
        increments the index of the current month. 12 (December) is followed by 1 (January). Updates this supplier's records as appropriate.

      • getCustomerRecords

        public CustomerDetailsList getCustomerRecords()
